title: tsgabrielle® Iridescence Collection Landing Page
prompt:
Title: tsgabrielle® Full-Screen Luna Clutch Page
Context: High-end fashion e-commerce website for tsgabrielle®, a brand owned by Gabrielle, a French transwoman.
Edit request: Redesign the Product Page for the Luna Clutch to be truly immersive and full-screen. 1) Standardize all text: Use sentence case or title case instead of all caps (e.g., 'Description', 'Details', 'Complete the look', 'Add to bag'). 2) Full-screen layout: The top section should be a high-impact, immersive view where the 3D Luna Clutch product imagery fills the entire screen. 3) Fixed info panel: On scroll, the product information (title, price, and a high-visibility solid purple 'Add to bag' button) should be presented in a fixed panel on the right, ensuring it's always visible. 4) Readability: Use 'Lato Regular' for all body text in a high-contrast charcoal (#1a1a1a) on the clean white background. 5) Branding: Maintain the transparent glass-morphism header and the vibrant purple brand footer at the very bottom. 6) Section flow: Ensure a logical vertical flow from the immersive product view to the detailed description tabs and the 'Complete the look' grid with holographic circular cards. 7) Headings: Keep the 'Luna Clutch' heading large with its dynamic liquid holographic GIF mask.
Platform: web
Form factor: desktop
name: projects/14663654536230992593/screens/d04cf9c51b6f400fbe03a2e9b9c70e02
